step.cmd: Scroll down to the Travel Preferences section. Select your discount travel rates/fare classes, and specify your Air, Hotel, and Car Rental Preferences. Under Frequent-Traveler Program, click Add a Program to add your frequent flyer programs
In the TSA Secure Flight section, verify the required Gender and Date of Birth fields.

In the Assistants and Travel Arrangers section, click Add an Assistant to assign someone to book travel for you, or to assign them as your primary assistant for travel. You can search for and select the individual(s) within your organization that you would like to give permission to perform travel functions for you.
After you have completed your Travel Profile updates, click Save
